snippet.title: Acrophile - A short first-person 2D point & click pixel style horror game!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://whilegameisfalse.itch.io/acrophile?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt There's an island in the Atlantic Ocean that doesn't show up on maps. A constant storm guards it from outsiders, and makes it impossible to tell day from night. There are rumours of an uncontacted tribe on the island... the discovery of a lifetime. Brought to you by PORTAL emulator. 

A short first-person 2D point & click pixel style horror game.

➡️ More from WhileGameIsFalse https://whilegameisfalse.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
